description.compact: Provides ini file location functions that work with and without a restart.

docblock.description: When the process has restarted it uses a tmp ini and stores the original ini locations in an environment variable.

description.compact: Returns an array of php.ini locations with at least one entry

docblock.description: The equivalent of calling php_ini_loaded_file then php_ini_scanned_files. The loaded ini location is the first entry and may be empty.

description.compact: Describes the location of the loaded php.ini file(s)
